name: Auidio
description:
An application to analyze the pitch of audio and help with tuning your musical instruments.

Being developed for the use in ProjectLam.

The AudioEffect of the project was developed as a GDExtension but then after observing instability and limited platform support with godot-cpp i decided to make it a module.

source code available at the github repo :

https://github.com/darthLeviN/Auidio-godot
